description: Preference Strength – gauges how strongly you value traits that map to each archetype. Used to gently tilt final scores (multipliers), not to overpower section results.

questions.question_text: On a scale from 1–10, how important is creating momentum and spark in shared experiences for you?
I enjoy being the one who energizes the vibe when things feel flat.
On a scale from 1–10, how much do you prioritize novelty and trying new things with others?
I actively seek uncharted activities or places together.
On a scale from 1–10, how committed are you to providing stability and care in close connections?
I identify with a steady caregiving role.
On a scale from 1–10, how important is leading decisively when stakes or pressure rise?
I feel a strong pull to set direction and raise performance for the group.
On a scale from 1–10, how central is emotional insight and attunement in how you connect?
I feel called to guide or advise with care and perspective.
On a scale from 1–10, how central are refinement, precision, and presentation in what you create or enjoy?
I strongly identify with crafting quality and elevating standards.
On a scale from 1–10, how important is creating transformation by blending elements (ritual, symbolism, mindset)?
I’m drawn to designing meaning-making moments that shift how things feel.
